about_the_game:
Enjoy the Original Soundtrack from the 1996 DOS Classic: PowerSlave, composed by Scott Branston and the team at Lobotomy Software.

Includes 18 action-packed Egyptian themed tracks of classic video game music.
Standard MP3 and High Quality FLAC file types are provided.
